title: Precision Pedagogy Research Trends Analysis: Big Data Integration Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic pedagogy and research methodologies
context.additional_context: Optimization of smartphone-based learning environments with emphasis on practical data analysis competencies

learning_goals: Learners can systematically analyze domestic and international precision teaching research trends
Learners can explain bibliometric meta-analysis procedures using visualization tools such as CiteSpace
Learners can derive core elements of big data-driven instructional design frameworks
Learners can evaluate the impact of precision teaching research on educational practices (core competencies, instructional models, etc.)

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
